TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ImageKeyConverter extends System.ComponentModel.StringConverter

summary.span: 提供在图像键数据与其他数据类型之间实现互相转换的类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert data for an image key to and from another data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于将转换的关键字值与其他数据类型。The class is used to convert key values of an to and from other data types. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅基类和[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). > [!NOTE] > 通常情况下，你并不直接创建的实例。Typically, you do not directly create an instance of an . 而应调用 类的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例基类。For more information, see the examples in the base class.

summary.span: 为与指定上下文关联的图像列表返回标准图像键的集合。

returns.span: 一个包含标准图像键值集的 。

span.span: A that contains the standard set of image key values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未不找到任何图像列表，与支持`null`作为标准值方法返回一个包含单个空字符串的集合。If no image list is found, and the supports `null` as a standard value, the method returns a collection containing a single empty string. 如果未不找到任何图像列表，和`null`作为标准值，不支持返回一个空集合。If no image list is found, and `null` is not supported as a standard value, returns an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果返回的列表方法是独占的其他任何值都有效。If the list returned by the method is exclusive, no other values are valid. 这是典型的枚举的数据类型。This is typical of an enumerated data type. 如果该列表不是独占的还有其他有效值标准的列表值之外提供。If the list is not exclusive, there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that provides. 当在此类型转换器实现，此方法始终返回`true`。As implemented in this type converter, this method always returns `true`. 通常情况下，应调用方法，然后再尝试使用和方法。Typically, you should call the method before you attempt to use the and methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在中实现类，方法始终返回`true`由于支持可以从列表中选取的映像索引值的标准集。As implemented in the class, the method always returns `true` since supports a standard set of index values for images that can be picked from a list.
